title: Real Animal Heroes: True Stories of Courage Devotion and Sacrifice
description: Animal heroes come in all shapes and household cats and K-9 warriors, pigs, pigeons, pedigree show dogs and mutts & mules- all with one thing in common- they are heroes, real heroes who have saved human life. Illustrated by John Kostelec *Ray Thomas lay gravely injured, unconscious and drowning, having just fallen to the bottom of an 80ft. ravine. Without hesitation, Woodie, the brave collie mix, leaped into the chasm to try and save his friend's life. *Though flames wrapped the stairs to the room where the children slept, tiny Mimi the poodle, with smoking fur, raced the gauntlet. If you are an animal lover you will love this book.
author: Paul Drew Stevens
